citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
At the time of inspection, the licensee was not able to locate multiple required documents, including the program of
veterinary care, the contingency plan, and the environment enhancement plan for birds.
Per this Section, all documents that are required to be kept under the AWA should be available at the time of an
inspection so the required documents can be reviewed to determine compliance with the provisions of the AWA. Failure to
provide documents and records prevents APHIS officials from verifying compliance with the provisions of the AWA.
Copies of all documents and records required under the AWA must be on the premises and available for review.
This inspection was a site approval inspection.
This site is not ready for approval to conduct activity covered under your current Animal Welfare Act License.
Conducting regulated activities at a non-approved site is a violation of the Animal Welfare Act.
Please contact your inspector to schedule your next new site approval inspection.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(a)(2) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
At the time of inspection, the licensee was not able to locate multiple required documents, including the program of 
veterinary care, the contingency plan, and the environment enhancement plan for birds.  
 
Per this Section, all documents that are required to be kept under the AWA should be available at the time of an 
inspection so the required documents can be reviewed to determine compliance with the provisions of the AWA. Failure to 
provide documents and records prevents APHIS officials from verifying compliance with the provisions of the AWA. 
Copies of all documents and records required under the AWA must be on the premises and available for review. 
 
This inspection was a site approval inspection. 
 
This site is not ready for approval to conduct activity covered under your current Animal Welfare Act License. 
 
Conducting regulated activities at a non-approved site is a violation of the Animal Welfare Act. 
 
Please contact your inspector to schedule your next new site approval inspection. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives. 
 
End Section

species.common: BUDGERIGAR / BUDGIE / COMMON PARAKEET / SHELL PARAKEET
